title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 547/1999 of 12 March 1999 amending Regulation (EC) No 2802/95 concerning the classification of certain goods in the Combined Nomenclature
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 547/1999 of 12 March 1999 amending Regulation (EC) No 2802/95 concerning the classification of certain goods in the Combined Nomenclature
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The classification of product No 1 in the Annex to Regulation (EC) No 2802/95 shall be replaced by that in the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the 21st day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 12 March 1999.
For the Commission
Mario MONTI
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 256, 7. 9. 1987, p. 1.
(2) OJ L 292, 30. 10. 1998, p. 1.
(3) OJ L 291, 6. 12. 1995, p. 5.
ANNEX
